Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers

Class GameBoardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers.GameBoardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class GameBoardController
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUIController
This class is the GUIController which handles updating and interaction for the GAME_BOARD scene, the main scene of the game

      Parameters:
      providingDepotNumber - the number of the depot from which to take the resource
      receivingDepotNumber - the number of the depot to which to send the resource
      resource - the resource to be transferred
      quantity - the amount of resource to transfer

      level - the level of the card to take
